instM[0] = 32'b00111100000000000000000000000000; //nop
instM[1] = 32'b00100011111111110000000000000000; //store m31 r31 r0
instM[2] = 32'b01001011111000000000000000000000; //out m31
instM[3] = 32'b00001011111111110000000000000001; //addi r31 r31 1
instM[4] = 32'b00100011111111110000000000000000; //store m31 r31 r0
instM[5] = 32'b01001011111000000000000000000000; //out m31
